courses.title: Guitar Fundamentals
courses.description: A comprehensive introduction to guitar techniques, chords, and scales for beginners.

courses.title: Advanced Piano Techniques
courses.description: Master advanced piano skills, including improvisation, complex chord progressions, and performance tips.

courses.title: Introduction to Drumming
courses.description: Learn basic drumming patterns, rhythm exercises, and essential drumming techniques.

courses.title: Vocal Training for Beginners
courses.description: Develop your singing voice with breath control, vocal exercises, and performance techniques.

courses.title: Jazz Saxophone Essentials
courses.description: Explore the key elements of jazz saxophone playing, including improvisation and scales.
